name: BI Developer
description:
VIA SMS Group is an alternative financial services provider operating across the Europe and Asia‑Pacific. Since the company launch, it has expanded its operations to 9 countries and has grown into a versatile fintech enterprise offering simple and accessible financial solutions under various brand names. Company headquarters are located in Riga, Latvia.

As the volume of data keeps growing we are looking for a new colleague to join our friendly team and fill the position of BI Developer within the Business Intelligence Department for a work remotely.

What you will do:

  • Collaborate across multiple teams to research, architect, engineer and configure complex data analytic solutions
  • Create functional data reports using QlikView and QlikSense
  • To perform data quality analysis, identify improvement options and proposals to increase efficiency of gathered business data
  • Ensure technical documentation and troubleshooting support

A bit about you:

  • You have practical experience in working with SQL
  • You have analytical and problem-solving mindset
  • You are fluent in English (both written and verbal)
  • You have similar working experience with BI reporting tolls

We offer:

  • Dynamic and interesting work in progressive international fintech company
  • Remuneration depending on your professional experience starting from 2000 EUR before taxes
  • Informal, people-oriented culture
  • Various opportunities to engage in company's social life
  • Opportunities for personal and professional growth

Drop us your CV!
